title: AI Recipe Chatbot
description: An AI-powered cooking assistant that suggests recipes based on available ingredients using OpenAI's API.
readme:
üç≥ AI Recipe Chatbot

A smart culinary assistant that helps you decide what to cook. Simply input your available ingredients, and the bot uses OpenAI's GPT models to generate delicious recipes.

üåü Features

  • Ingredient-based recipe generation
  • Step-by-step cooking instructions
  • Dietary restriction filtering

üõ† Tech Stack

  • Python
  • OpenAI API
  • Streamlit (UI)

title: E-Commerce Microservices
description: A scalable e-commerce backend built with Node.js and RabbitMQ for asynchronous processing. Handles high-concurrency order placement.
readme:
üõí E-Commerce Backend

This project demonstrates a microservices architecture designed for high-scale e-commerce operations. It splits concerns into separate services: Order, Product, and User.

üîß Tech Stack

  • Runtime: Node.js
  • Message Broker: RabbitMQ for async communication
  • Cache: Redis for session and product caching
  • Containerization: Docker & Docker Compose

üöÄ Key Features

  • Asynchronous order processing to prevent blocking
  • JWT Authentication and Role Based Access Control
  • Horizontal scaling support

title: AI Image Generator Bot
description: Discord bot integration using OpenAI DALL-E 3 API. Includes rate limiting, user credit system, and gallery generation.
readme:
ü§ñ AI Image Bot

A Discord bot that brings DALL-E 3 directly to your server. Users can prompt images, save them to a personal gallery, and upscale them.

‚ú® Features

  • Slash commands integration
  • User credit economy system
  • PostgreSQL database for reliable storage
  • Auto-moderation for NSFW prompts

üì¶ Installation

pip install -r requirements.txt
python bot.py

title: React Dashboard Kit
description: A comprehensive admin dashboard template featuring dark mode, charts, and data tables with sorting/filtering.
readme:
üìä React Dashboard Kit

A production-ready dashboard template. Built to save time on setup and focus on business logic.

üé® Components

  • Responsive Sidebar & Header
  • Data Tables with Sort/Filter

title: Algorithmic Trading Bot
description: Automated cryptocurrency trading script using moving averages and RSI indicators. Backtesting engine included.
readme:
üìà Crypto Algo Trader

Automates trading strategies on Binance via API. It monitors market data in real-time and executes buy/sell orders based on configured indicators.

‚öôÔ∏è Strategies Configured

  • Golden Cross: MA50 crossing above MA200
  • RSI Oversold: Buying when RSI < 30

Disclaimer: Use at your own risk.

title: Real-time Chat App
description: WebSocket-based chat application with room support, media sharing, and message encryption features.
readme:
üí¨ Real-time Chat

Features
